General.Name: Sietel Ltd
General.Description: Sietel Limited invests in industrial, commercial, and retail real estate and listed company securities in Australia. The company also finances and leases facilities, as well as offers plant and management services. In addition, it trades as a commercial vehicle body builder; and a designer, developer, importer, and distributor of domestic appliances, as well as a property maintenance company. The company was incorporated in 1937 and is based in Moorabbin, Australia.
